characters.etymology: A nose pointing at oneself - you point to your nose to mean 'me'
characters.pithy_formula: I JAB my NOSE and BARK 'DZU!' - MYSELF, no one else!
characters.story: I JAB my finger at my own NOSE and BARK 'DZU!' with sharp pride. MYSELF - this nose, this face, this body. The command is absolute: I am pointing at ME.

similar_warning.repulsion: 自 has a CLOSED top (nose bridge); 白 is OPEN at top (light escaping)

characters.etymology: Sun with a beam of light escaping upward = pure white radiance
characters.pithy_formula: WHITE light EXPLODES - I GASP 'BYE?!' as it blinds me!
characters.story: WHITE light EXPLODES from the sun's core. I GASP 'BYE?!' in shock as the pure radiance blinds me - so bright, so WHITE, my voice rising in startled pain.

similar_warning.repulsion: 白 is OPEN at top (light escaping); 自 has CLOSED top (nose bridge)

characters.etymology: One (一) on top of white (白) = one hundred (complete set of white/pure)
characters.pithy_formula: ONE HUNDRED corpses GROAN 'Byeee...' from the mass grave.
characters.story: ONE HUNDRED rotting corpses GROAN 'Byeee...' from the mass grave. I count them - a HUNDRED white skulls, each groaning low and creaky. The zombie chorus says farewell.

similar_warning.repulsion: 百 has ONE (一) on top (multiplied to hundred); 白 is just white alone

characters.etymology: White (白) + seven (七) = soap (seven-fold purification to white)
characters.pithy_formula: I SCRUB with SOAP and COMMAND 'DZOW!' - CLEAN it now!
characters.story: I SCRUB the filth with harsh SOAP, COMMANDING 'DZOW!' as the white lather strips the grime away. Sharp, decisive cleaning. Seven scrubs to pure white perfection.

characters.etymology: An arrow piercing straight through the center of a target/box
characters.pithy_formula: I PIERCE the MIDDLE and SING 'JOHHHNG!' - perfect bullseye!
characters.story: I PIERCE the target dead center, SINGING 'JOHHHNG!' as the arrow hits the MIDDLE. The sustained high note rings out - bullseye! Perfect center, sustained glory.

characters.etymology: A person standing tall over ten = ten times a hundred = thousand
characters.pithy_formula: A THOUSAND soldiers SING 'CHYENNN!' marching as one.
characters.story: A THOUSAND soldiers march toward me, SINGING 'CHYENNN!' in sustained unison. The high note holds forever - a thousand voices, a thousand boots, one endless sound.

characters.etymology: Something protruding from a mouth = tongue (tastes a thousand things)
characters.pithy_formula: My TONGUE touches poison - I GASP 'SHUH?!' in shock!
characters.story: My TONGUE touches something vile and I GASP 'SHUH?!' in rising shock. The taste BURNS - my tongue recoils, voice rising in pure startled disgust.

characters.etymology: Strokes rising upward = measurement rising = liter (also 'to rise')
characters.pithy_formula: The LITER rises and I SING 'SHUNNNG!' as it overflows!
characters.story: The liquid rises one LITER at a time. I SING 'SHUNNNG!' in a high sustained note as it climbs and overflows - rising, rising, my voice holding steady.

similar_warning.repulsion: 升 is the simple form (just rising); 昇 adds SUN (celestial rising)

characters.etymology: Sun (日) + rise (升) = the sun rising up (grander than 升)
characters.pithy_formula: The SUN RISES UP - I SING 'SHUNNNG!' as it climbs the sky!
characters.story: The SUN RISES UP over the horizon. I SING 'SHUNNNG!' in a sustained high note as golden light floods the world - celestial ascent, my voice matching its climb.

similar_warning.repulsion: 昇 has SUN (日) added (celestial rising); 升 is simple measurement

characters.etymology: A curved shape with something inside = round pill with medicine
characters.pithy_formula: I swallow the PILL and GASP 'WAHN?!' - it's stuck in my throat!
characters.story: I swallow the PILL and GASP 'WAHN?!' in rising panic - it's STUCK in my throat! The round medicine lodges there, my voice rising in choked surprise.

similar_warning.repulsion: 丸 has a DOT inside (pill filling); 九 is EMPTY hook (just the number)

characters.etymology: The crack pattern that appears on heated oracle bones = divination
characters.pithy_formula: The oracle bone cracks - a ghost GROANS 'Booo...' DIVINING my fate.
characters.story: I heat the oracle bone and it CRACKS. A ghost GROANS 'Booo...' from within, DIVINING my fate in low, creaky tones. The spirits speak through the fracture.

characters.etymology: Divination (卜) + mouth (口) = speaking fortunes aloud
characters.pithy_formula: The fortune-teller COMMANDS 'JAHN!' - your fate is SEALED!
characters.story: The fortune-teller reads the cracks and COMMANDS 'JAHN!' with sharp finality. Your fate is SEALED. I hear the verdict crash down - no appeal, no escape.

similar_warning.repulsion: 占 has CRACK (卜) on top (divining); 古 has TEN (十) on top (ten generations)

characters.etymology: A mark pointing upward above a baseline = above
characters.pithy_formula: I THRUST upward and BARK 'SHAHNG!' - ABOVE all others!
characters.story: I THRUST my fist ABOVE my head and BARK 'SHAHNG!' with commanding force. I rise ABOVE all others - the sharp falling tone of victory, towering over everything.

similar_warning.repulsion: 上 points UP (mark above line); 下 points DOWN (mark below line)

characters.etymology: A mark pointing downward below a baseline = below
characters.pithy_formula: I STOMP down and COMMAND 'SHYAH!' - crushed BELOW!
characters.story: I STOMP my enemy BELOW my boot and COMMAND 'SHYAH!' with vicious force. Crushed beneath me - the sharp falling tone of domination, grinding them into the ground.

similar_warning.repulsion: 下 points DOWN (mark below line); 上 points UP (mark above line)

characters.etymology: Caught between above (上) and below (下) = stuck like a card in a slot
characters.pithy_formula: The CARD gets STUCK - I GROAN 'Kahhh...' trapped between!
characters.story: My CARD gets STUCK in the machine. I GROAN 'Kahhh...' in low, creaky frustration - trapped between above and below, neither in nor out. Stuck. Zombie-patience.

characters.etymology: Standing tall above the rest = eminent, outstanding
characters.pithy_formula: The EMINENT one towers above - I GASP 'JOH?!' at their height!
characters.story: The EMINENT master towers above the crowd. I GASP 'JOH?!' in rising awe - so tall, so outstanding! My voice climbs upward matching their incredible height.

characters.etymology: Sun and moon together with growth = morning court = dynasty
characters.pithy_formula: The DYNASTY rises - I GASP 'CHOW?!' as the empire emerges!
characters.story: The new DYNASTY rises from chaos. I GASP 'CHOW?!' in shocked awe as sun and moon align - an empire born! My voice rises with the emerging power.

similar_warning.repulsion: 朝 stands alone (dynasty/power); 嘲 adds MOUTH (口) for mocking speech

characters.etymology: Mouth (口) + dynasty (朝) = mocking the powerful = ridicule
characters.phonetic_note: Same sound as 朝 - the mouth adds mocking meaning
characters.pithy_formula: A MOUTH mocks the dynasty - I GASP 'CHOW?!' at the RIDICULE!
characters.story: A MOUTH dares to mock the dynasty! I GASP 'CHOW?!' in rising shock at the RIDICULE. Someone speaks against power - my voice rises in startled disbelief.

similar_warning.repulsion: 嘲 adds MOUTH (口) for mocking speech; 朝 is the dynasty being mocked

lesson_palace.description: A vertical spire where direction matters - up leads to power, down to doom

character_stations.白: Bleaching room: white light explodes from walls
character_stations.百: Mass grave basement: hundred skulls groan below
character_stations.皂: Washroom: harsh soap strips away grime
character_stations.中: Archery range: arrows pierce the center target
character_stations.千: Parade grounds: thousand soldiers march past
character_stations.舌: Tasting chamber: tongues test strange poisons
character_stations.升: Measuring room: liquids rise in graduated cylinders
character_stations.昇: Sunrise balcony: watching the sun ascend
character_stations.丸: Apothecary: pills lodge in patients' throats
character_stations.卜: Oracle bone vault: cracks reveal fates
character_stations.上: Upper platform: fists thrust toward the ceiling
character_stations.下: Lower pit: enemies crushed beneath boots
character_stations.卓: Throne platform: eminent figures tower above
character_stations.朝: Imperial court: dynasty rises in morning light
character_stations.嘲: Jester's corner: mouths mock the powerful
